narrative:
Facility has passed Pre-License inspection.     
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
*   No regulated activities may be conducted until USDA license is issued. 
*  Applicant wants to be licensed as a Class C dealer.
*  Record keeping requirements were explained to the applicant.
 
*   The facility inspection and exit briefing done on 9/25/14 were conducted with the applicant.
 
*   Copy of inspection report was sent by regular and certified Mail.
